attributes.action: Respect, ensure & promote our Christian faith & its political, democracy
attributes.additional_details: We must further strengthen & protect our Equality Act 201@ Religion & its beliefs: our Christian Country, its faith & its political democratic laws, policies & values, alongside our Human Rights Act 1988 Freedom of Expression, article 10 & non-discrimination article 14 are further strengthened & protected from any other religions that Christianity was not derived from further ensuring & strengthening it is respected, ensured & promoted against critic, criticism & condemnation.
attributes.background: Strengthen our Christian religion; its faith & beliefs; our political, democratic democracy ensuring its respected, ensured & promoted

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
